mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, user_name, password, phone, gender, national, address, birthday, age, icd, icd_name, diagnose_type, diagnose_time, source_time, cerate_time, is_delete, user_state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{national,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnoseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diagnoseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
national = #{national,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, national = #{national,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icd = #{icd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icd_name = #{icdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diagnose_type = #{diagnoseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diagnose_time = #{diagnoseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, source_time = #{sourceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cerate_time = #{cerateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from t_user
